structure.unit: Real And Personal Property And Domestic Relations
Descent And Distribution, Wills, Estates Of Deceased Persons And Absentees, Guardianship, Conservatorship And Trusts
Bonds Of Executors, Administrators, Guardians, Conservators, Trustees And Receivers

law.catch_line: Joint Executors; Failure To Give Bond; Effect
law.text: If two or more persons are appointed executors, none shall intermeddle or act as such but those who give bond as before provided.
